content.body: smaug: Luca Casonato: see https://github.com/w3c/FileAPI/issues/43 for changing that (it shouldn't lowercase parameters as that can change meaning in certain cases, such as with `boundary`)

content.body: Yeah, all browsers agree on it being an HTMLUnknownElement _except_ gecko when created from the parser, because we forgot to regenerate the C++ sources / ElementName.java :-(
